name: @elizaos/plugin-memory
description: Advanced memory management plugin for elizaOS with conversation summarization and long-term persistent memory

scripts.build: npm run build:prompts && bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust
scripts.build:ts: cd typescript && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:wasm: cd rust && wasm-pack build --target web --features wasm
scripts.test: bun run test:ts && bun run test:rust && bun run test:python
scripts.test:ts: bun test typescript/src/__tests__/ || echo 'No typescript tests yet'
scripts.format:python: cd python && python3 -m black elizaos_plugin_memory/ tests/ || echo 'Python formatting requires black'

author: elizaOS Team

MEMORY_SUMMARIZATION_THRESHOLD.description: Number of messages before automatic summarization

MEMORY_RETAIN_RECENT.description: Number of recent messages to retain after summarization

MEMORY_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD.description: Minimum confidence score to store long-term memories
